title: Cloudflare outage hits multiple crypto websites, social media channels
description: Many users reported not having access to websites, including Coinbase and Blockchain.com, and social media platforms after Cloudflare reported an “internal service degradation.”

title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
description: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

title: Brazil weighs tax on international crypto transfers as it aligns rules with CARF
description: Brazil is reportedly considering imposing a tax on the use of cryptocurrency for international payments, as it aligns its rules with a global standard for sharing tax data.

title: Crypto private key theft is now big business: Here’s what to know
description: Private key theft has become an automated, industrialized threat, highlighting the need for crypto users to remain vigilant, according to a report by GK8, a subsidiary of Galaxy Digital.

title: Pantera-backed aPriori silent after one entity claims 60% of airdrop
description: About 60% of aPriori’s APR airdrop was claimed by a single entity across 14,000 interconnected wallets, according to Bubblemaps.

title: How Pi Network’s 50M nodes could reshape the future of decentralized AI
description: Pi is turning its giant mobile community into a distributed compute grid, testing whether AI can run on a global crowd instead of the cloud.

title: El Salvador’s latest $100M Bitcoin haul rekindles questions around IMF program
description: El Salvador says it has bought 1,090 BTC worth over $100 million, raising questions about an IMF loan pledge to limit Bitcoin exposure and fiscal risks.

title: Mastercard taps Polygon to turn clunky crypto addresses into simple usernames
description: Mastercard is rolling out verified, human-readable crypto aliases to self-custody wallets, using Polygon for onchain support and Mercuryo for identity verification.

title: Libra token-linked wallets pull $4M and bet big on Solana
description: Wallets tied to the Libra token continue to draw liquidity and have purchased $61.5 million in Solana, despite asset freezes and fraud probes.

title: Grab deepens stablecoin push with StraitsX Web3 wallet and settlements
description: Southeast Asian super app Grab’s MOU with StraitsX shifts its Web3 efforts from pilots to infrastructure, exploring a unified stablecoin settlement layer across Asia.

title: Dimensional Becomes Second Firm to Win SEC ETF-Mutual Fund Hybrid Approval
description: Dimensional Fund Advisors secured SEC approval to operate ETF and mutual fund share classes in a single structure, positioning itself as the first to apply this hybrid model to actively managed strategies while nearly 90 other firms await similar clearance. The post Dimensional Becomes Second Firm to Win SEC ETF-Mutual Fund Hybrid Approval appeared first on Cryptonews.

title: Bitcoin Price Prediction: 95% of All BTC Just Got Mined – Real Scarcity Starting Now?

title: S&P 500 Set for Longest Losing Streak Since August as Bitcoin Falls Below $90K

title: Mastercard Selects Polygon to Power Verified Username Transfers for Self-Custody Wallets
description: Mastercard, Polygon Labs and Mercuryo have announced they are extending Mastercard Crypto Credential to self-custody wallets, adding username-style aliases intended to eliminate the need for long alphanumeric wallet addresses. title: Korea Faces Fresh Crypto Tax Chaos as 2027 Deadline Nears: Report
description: South Korean crypto tax implementation faces a fourth potential delay to 2027 after proposed amendments to the Income Tax Act failed to address fundamental issues, and research warns that continued postponements could trigger tax resistance among cryptocurrency users and destabilize the market. The post Korea Faces Fresh Crypto Tax Chaos as 2027 Deadline Nears: Report appeared first on Cryptonews.

title: Bitcoin Miner HIVE Digital Scores 285% Revenue Pump Thanks To BTC Expansion
description: HIVE Digital Technologies delivered record second-quarter revenue of $87.3 million, surging 285% from the prior year, as the Canadian miner aggressively expanded Bitcoin operations to 25 EH/s while scaling its high-performance computing division amid broader industry pressure. The post Bitcoin Miner HIVE Digital Scores 285% Revenue Pump Thanks To BTC Expansion appeared first on Cryptonews.

title: Bitcoin Slides Below $90K as ETF Investors Face First Major Losses – More Dips Ahead?
description: Bitcoin breached $90,000 for the first time since April, erasing 2025 gains and marking the first collective loss for spot ETF investors amid intensifying profit-taking by long-term holders and mounting traditional market concerns. The post Bitcoin Slides Below $90K as ETF Investors Face First Major Losses – More Dips Ahead? appeared first on Cryptonews.

title: Mt. Gox Moves $936M in Bitcoin to Unmarked Wallet Address After 8 Month Hiatus

title: VanEck Launches Third US Solana Staking ETF as Altcoin Funds Surge

title: Swiss Bank AMINA Wins Hong Kong Approval for Institutional Crypto Services
